Title: KIRKS FOLLY Vintage Hair Comb Black Velvet ULTRA RARE KFB
Description: This outstanding Kirks Folly hair comb is black featuring black velvet! This piece has been in storage and NEVER BEEN WORN. The comb measures approximately 4.25 inches in width. One tooth sticks up a litte more than the others...see photos. This is a rare and gorgeous piece. A PERFECT GIFT! The hair comb is part of a collection that was recently acquired from a jewelry store that was closing. The owner of the store was an avid Kirks Folly collector and she had MANY rare pieces purchased directly through a personal arrangement she had with the Kirk Family here in Rhode Island. The collection includes modern & vintage items. Many of the vintage items were unworn & had been stored for many years on the original card. SHIPPING:Combined shipping discounts are available.
